comment.body:
Hello,
As far as I understand, this is your report - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/130449#issuecomment-1255840957
If so, could you please ensure that `AdGuard Advanced Blocking` is enabled in Safari`s settings - Extensions (if not, please enable it).
Then please open AdGuard for Safari, update filters (wait about 30-60 seconds until updating process will be finished), refresh website few times and then check if issue still occurs.
